description: The head of our business who commands all operations the business undertakes, and supervises other departments.
The head of our financial department, who looks at how the finances are doing within the business and informs the CEO.
The head of our customer facing department, who is responsible for how we interact with our customers and our publicity.
Monitors all incoming and outgoing transactions from users and flagging any anomalies, as well as ensuring all money is secure.

Makes sure that our customers are happy and that our advertising and public appearance is positive, as well as hosting events.
